direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's this? There is something written on the wall Martha reads. Martha signals to a girl in the kitchen to go outside. VOICE Jane. Is Watts there? MARTHA Can I help you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's Marlene Lewis. What's your last name Jane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heller, sorry, do I have the right number? Martha writes JANE HELLER on a list of names on the wall. Some of them have been scratched out. MARTHA I don't know, do you? Watts comes inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a Jane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey. How are you? Sure, yeah, let's do it, I'll be around there on Friday. No, that was my cousin Marlene, yeah, I'll see you in a bit then. Great, I'm glad you called. Watts hangs up. He and Martha have a quiet exchange and Watts walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey. Martha just stands there quietly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Martha cooks with Katie. Martha sneaks a bite of bread. Katie whacks her in the ear with a wooden spoon. A slight ringing remains throughout the scene.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing till they're done. You know better.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. Sorry Katie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Who's Katie?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Martha turns her head to see Lucy instead of Katie. Martha is at the lake house cooking with Lucy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's Katie?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, nothing. Beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lucy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is this from the past or is this now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't remember waking up this morning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you go sit down, I'll finish up. Lucy hands water and some pills to Martha. Martha takes the pills, walks into the other room and collapses on the couch in front of the television. Ted walks into the kitchen. Martha listens from the couch. He reaches out and holds her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's going on?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who the fuck knows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She needs to see someone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll start looking into places tomorrow. We can arrange for her to be somewhere by Wednesday.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Places?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think she should stay with us anymore. We can't do anything for her when she's like this. Lucy goes back to chopping.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't want to talk about it anymore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Martha and Zoe sit in bed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Zoe?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't stop feeling terrible for that poor man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. It happens though, we're never really dead or alive, we just exist, so he's still existing, but it's in a parallel time. Just don't think about it, it's in the past. Martha is upset with how cold Zoe is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Martha sits in the bathroom, knees pulled up to her chest as she rests on the edge of the bathtub. 75. Someone knocks at the door. She pretends not to be in there. There is another gentle know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Martha, it's me, can I come in? Martha unlocks the door for Zoe. Patrick bursts in, slams the door and corners Martha and yells at her. PATRICK Haven't you learned anything?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I felt like we had a connection.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We do!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's not what you're showing me. Patrick calms down. He sits. PATRICK (CONT'D) Maybe I asked too much from you too soon. You have potential but you're just not there yet. I'll expect less of you fro now on. Martha is upset, like a trained animal, she runs back to his side, sits next to him and rests her head on his shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry. He runs his hand through her hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shhh. It's okay. He puts his hand on the inside of her thigh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're my favorite, I won't lose you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Martha wakes up on the couch confused, she sees a man standing over her. She quickly pushes him up, jumps over tyhe back of the couch and runs away. The man is Ted. He follows her, trying to calm her down but she is in a blind state of panic. She runs to the stairs. He follows her. She trips. He goes to see if she is okay. She kicks him. He falls down the stairs. The lights turn on. Lucy comes out of the bedroom to see Ted at the bottom of the stairs. She rushes over to him. Ted gets up slowly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you alright? Ted pushes Lucy off of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the fuck happened?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She kicked me down the stairs. Jesus Christ, what's it going to take, Lucy. Martha starts crying, she becomes hysterical. Lucy is irate, she runs up the stairs and confronts Martha.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You could have killed him. Martha backs away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: About what, what are you so confused about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought he was someone else. Lucy's anger is building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You thought he was someone else? What is wrong with you? (BEAT) I'm not doing this anymore, I'm not doing this anymore. I beat myself up over you for years and I'm sick of it, I'm sick of chasing you down and worrying about you. I need to move on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You need help Martha.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened to you? Martha shakes her head with a severe look of fear in her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened to you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. Lucy doesn't know what else to do, she can see Martha is too far gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're going to get you proper help. There is a long moment of silence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you going to send me away?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know how to help you anymore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please don't. Please don't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't help you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, I can't be alone, please.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're trying to start a family and I don't trust you to be here. Lucy walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lucy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? Lucy stops at the bottom of the stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're going to be a terrible mother. Lucy freezes, she tries to stay calm but bursts into tears. There is a long, tense silence. Lucy dries her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you have any money left? Martha shakes her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course you don't. (BEAT) We'll make sure everything is taken care of. Lucy walks away, Martha is frozen on the stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Martha walks through the house. All of the luggage is packed and sitting by the front door. Ted sits on the couch eating a sandwich and drinking a beer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is an overcast, unusually cold Labor Day. Lucy works in the garden.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Going swimming?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a bit chilly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't mind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think we both said some things last night that we didn't mean.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We scheduled an appointment for you tomorrow morning. Martha looks into the back of the flower bed and notices footprints.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's it like there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It looks nice. Martha turns and walks down to the water.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're heading back to the city in about an hour. You'll be ready to go?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Martha stands on the dock. She strips down to her underwear and dives in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Martha swims out into the lake. She drops under the water and out of sight, a burst of bubbles pop up to the surface. A few seconds pass by and she is not coming up. Suddenly she breaks back through the water and gasps for air. She looks around at the thick woods and a handful of nice homes that appear to be empty now. No one else is swimming. Martha sees a scruffy MAN sitting on a neighboring dock, he seems familiar. He is in his mid twenties, his jeans are rolled up and his feet dangle in the water. His shirt is slung over his shoulder and he smokes a cigarette. He looks directly at Martha. They make eye contact. He finishes his smoke, throws the cigarette in the water, puts on his shirt and just sits there. Martha swims back to the house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Martha sits in the back seat of Ted and Lucy's car. Ted drives and Lucy sits up front. They drive up the driveway and turn out onto the road. Ted and Lucy talk. Martha gets a concerned look on her face. Ted slams on the breaks. TED Jesus Christ. LUCY Are you okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fucking idiot. What was he doing? The MAN from the dock walks past the car. They almost hit him. As they drive away, Martha turns to see him get into the a brown car, start the engine and drive. The car drives behind Ted's car. Martha looks forward for a long moment, then turns back again to see that he is still there.
direction.name: direction
